web_snippets: Eleanor Barraclough. Historian, Broadcaster, Writer. Home ... Previously, I was Associate Professor in Medieval History and Literature at Durham University.
Eleanor Rosamund Barraclough FSA FRHistS is a British historian, broadcaster and writer. Eleanor Barraclough. Academic background.
Eleanor Barraclough is a historian, writer and broadcaster based at Bath Spa University, where she is Senior Lecturer in Environmental History.
